|rad1chip3 = |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Default settings (including the SSID) are per '''Fujitsu Siemens''''s manual. :The used OUI is presumed to be 00:60:B3 ('''Z-Com'''). There are ~600 hits for the '''CONNECT2AIR''' SSID w/ the 00:60:B3 OUI as of 2013-06-30. ==Links of Interest== [http://support.fr.ts.fujitsu.com/Download/ShowDescription.asp?SoftwareGUID=66D103E8-A6C2-43BB-8149-FD3447A27B50&Info=FTS Manual (EN)]
[http://support.fr.ts.fujitsu.com/Download/ShowDescription.asp?SoftwareGUID=28C846F4-E2CB-488C-AA24-7F54AEBDF340&Info=FTS Firmware (version 7.0)] [http://isl3893.wikidot.com/siemens-ap-600rp-usb On http://isl3893.wikidot.com] [[Category:English Documentation]]
